title: Conditional relative frequency for video games

content.description: First-year students enrolled at a college were asked whether they play video games. The responses, classified by whether the students were enrolled in the school of sciences or the school of arts, are shown in the table.
content.question: Of all the students enrolled in the school of arts who responded, approximately what proportion responded that they play video games?

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Calculate summary statistics, relative positions of points within a distribution, correlation, and predicted response.
